text: Grammer is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Andy Grammer, American singer and songwriter *Billy Grammer, American singer *Camille Grammer, American television personality *Elijah S. Grammer, American businessman and politician *Greer Grammer, American actress *Harry Grammer, American poet *Kelsey Grammer, American actor *Mabel Grammer, American journalist *Red Grammer, American singer and songwriter *Robin Grammer Jr., American politician *Spencer Grammer, American actress *Tracy Grammer, American folk singer ==See also== *Grammer (disambiguation)
title: Grammer (surname)
